entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Lethbridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:01 p.m. MDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Sunday 2 April 2023
